title: Pc
body: Hi guys ! How many fps i will get on LoL with this computer at medium . Link: http://www.olx.ro/i2/oferta/sistem-pc-i3-6gb-ddr3-gt440-ID6mwMs.html#:1978b41e36

replies.body:
I can't give you a specific figure on max FPS, but given the dedicated graphics card, you should have no issue hitting a constant 60 FPS on medium settings.

For more reference, check out our [Minimum and recommended system specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements/). Let me know if you have any questions.
